sentence.Network_en: In 1970, at his new wife's behest, they moved to Southampton.
sentence.Network_cn: 1970年，应他新任妻子的要求，他们搬到了南安普敦。

sentence.Network_en: I called the office at the behest of my secretary.
sentence.Network_cn: 在秘书的催促下,我给办公室打了电话.

sentence.Network_en: They arrested him at the King's behest.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们奉国王之命逮捕了他.

developing nuclear plants only at the behest of government will also make it harder for the industry to improve its safety culture .仅仅在政府的命令下发展核电站会使核电行业很难改善其安全素养。

list.abs: But his arrest at the behest of Serbia will damage its relations with Bosnia ., 然而他在塞尔维亚的要求下被逮捕 , 这将损害塞国同波黑的关系.

RelatedPhrase.word: at the behest of the waves

list.key: at the behest of the waves
list.abs: the seas are rough , and the wooden boat rocks violently at the behest of the waves .大海上波涛汹涌，木制渔船在波涛之中剧烈摇晃。

just 11 months before the 2008 Beijing Games begin , journalists in China continue to face physical abuse and harassment from police and plainclothes thugs who appear to work at official behest .在离2008年奥运会开幕仅剩11个月的今天，在中国的新闻工作者们仍然遭到来自警方和看起来是为政府效劳的便衣歹徒的人身侵犯

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  behǽs 'a vow', from a Germanic base meaning 'bid'; related to hight

entry.tran: 按…的吩咐；应…的要求；遵照…的命令
entry.def: If something is done at someone's behest, it is done because they have ordered or requested it.

example.ex: In 1970, at his new wife's behest, they moved to Southampton...
example.tran: 1970年，应他新任妻子的要求，他们搬到了南安普敦。

example.ex: The policy document was produced at the behest of John Major and other world leaders.
example.tran: 这份政策文件是在约翰·梅杰和其他国家领导人的授意下拟定的。

auth_sentence.content: Sao Tome establishes formal diplomatic relations with Taiwan at Trovoada's behest.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sao Tome establishes formal diplomatic relations with Taiwan at Trovoada's behest.

auth_sentence.content: They were sheltered; they lived at the behest of human beings.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were sheltered; they lived at the behest of human beings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were sheltered; they lived at the behest of human beings.

auth_sentence.content: Then, at the behest of a friend, I finally went there.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then, at the behest of a friend, I finally went there.
